titleStmt.title: [Plans for the establishment of a school] 1839 Sep. 20 [Tennessee] / Daniel Montgomery: a machine readable transcription of an image
titleStmt.author: Montgomery, Daniel

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Plans for the establishment of a school] 1839 Sep. 20 [Tennessee] / Daniel Montgomery
bibl.author: Montgomery, Daniel
bibl.note: This is a legal document dated September 20, 1839. Daniel Montgomery is providing land for a school house. The document also contains the monetary amounts and work that several men have donated to get the school started.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.p: I Daniel Montgomery propose to give One acre of ground to Begin at a point Sixty feet west of the Meting house Sprin Running North and South and West to Hugh Kirkpatricks line with the privilage of the Spring for the use of the 9th District to Bild a School house on and to have it as long as they us it for a School.

table.head: We the undersigned Bind ourselves to pay the amt Subscribed for the purpose of building a good & Substantial School house this 20th September 1839
